about_the_game:
Turtle Racer is an educational racing game designed for players to learn about biological marine life and their environment.

Players take the role of the humble sea turtle as they explore the ocean to learn about sea life and test their knowledge in a thrilling race through an exotic ocean trench!

Players have access to two different game modes:
  • A free, relaxed exploration of the ocean floor where they learn various facts about ocean life.
  • The exciting and fast-paced race where your knowledge on marine biology may be the only thing between victory or defeat.

Play the game as you wish!

Confident in your marine knowledge? Head straight into the race! If not, take your time and learn about the secrets of sea life. But be warned, throughout your race the sea will present various questions to you. Swim through the correct answer and the ocean current will give your turtle a brief speed boost! But answer wrong and your opponent may pull ahead.

Turtle Racer is an educational racing game designed for players to learn about biological marine life and their environment.

Players take the role of the humble sea turtle as they explore the ocean to learn about sea life and test their knowledge in a thrilling race through an exotic ocean trench!

  • The exciting and fast-paced race where your knowledge on marine biology may be the only thing between victory or defeat.

Play the game as you wish!

Confident in your marine knowledge? Head straight into the race! If not, take your time and learn about the secrets of sea life. But be warned, throughout your race the sea will present various questions to you. Swim through the correct answer and the ocean current will give your turtle a brief speed boost! name: Turtle Racer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 or AMD Phenom II X6 1100T
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti or Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 or Radeon R9 280X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

publishers: TDSDP is Transdisciplinary Data Scholars Development Program (TDSDP) - TDSDP Games Transdisciplinary Data Scholars Development Program at Bethune-Cookman University
short_description: Turtle Racing is an educational undersea experience where you speed through an ocean trench and use your knowledge of marine life to reach the finish before your opponent!
